Title: I’m Scared This Technology Will End My Business
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • An owner who’s afraid his business will become irrelevant 
  • How an unexpected death is impacting a family business 
  • The four keys to become a self-aware leader with Ken Coleman 
  • A business owner who’s looking for his team to take more ownership
